Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small SkewLattices Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small SkewLattices AllSmallSkewLattices is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic skewlattices models from orders 2 to 7.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of SkewLattices formulas(SkewLattices).
(x + y) + z = x + (y + z).
x + x = x.
(x * y) * z = x * (y * z).
x * x = x.
x * (x + y) = x & x = x + (x * y).
(x + y) * y = y & y = (x * y) + y.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
